item.title: Recent Dissertation Defense: Measuring and Trapping Quasiparticles in Superconducting Coplanar Waveguide Resonators
item.description: Congratulations to Dr. Ashish Alexander who successfully defended his Ph.D. doctoral thesis in Electrical Engineering.
